item.title: Need help with autodownloading my cache
item.dc:creator: @11j123 11j123
item.description:
@11j123 wrote:

I’ved uploaded my cache to mediafire… I know I have to copy and paste the download link into the cachedownloader.java file in my client, so I get in there, and I have nooo idea where to put it. I think I put it somewhere in between this…

[code=java]public CacheDownloader downloadCache() {
try {
File location = new File(getCacheDir());
File version = new File(getCacheDir() + “/cacheVersion” + getCacheVersion() + “.dat”);

	if(!location.exists()) {
		//drawLoadingText("Loading new Updates....");
		downloadFile(getCacheLink(), getArchivedName());

		unZip();
		//System.out.println("UNZIP");

		BufferedWriter versionFile = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(getCacheDir() + "/cacheVersion" + getCacheVersion() + ".dat"));
		versionFile.close();
		deleteZIP(getArchivedName());[/code]

If someone could help me out, that’d be great, thanks

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with autodownloading my cache
